product_name: Novara Rail Double Bike Shorts - Men's
long_description: The men's Novara Rail Double Mountain Bike Shorts have a stretch shell, lots of pockets and a cushy chamois to keep you nimble and cool when screaming down the trail. Sturdy, 2-way-stretch outer shorts move with you and resists abrasion; quick-drying fabric wicks moisture and has a durable water repellent finish. Mesh panel on backside of the men's Novara Rail Double Mountain Bike Shorts enhances airflow. Moisture-wicking polyester stretch-mesh liner shorts allow ample ventilation. Chamois features multilayer foam and a microfiber cover that wicks moisture away. Snap-closure waistband has a zipper fly; 2 rear rip-and-stick webbing tabs let you dial in the fit. Elastic grippers at leg hems keeps legs from riding up. Features 2 hand pockets, 2 zippered mesh-lined hip pockets and a multitool pocket with rip-and-stick closure. With a UPF 50+ rating, fabric provides excellent protection against harmful ultraviolet rays.
